name: The Rude, the Mad, & the Ugly
name_original: The Rude, the Mad, & the Ugly
description:
Team:  Five Fancy Mustachios
This game was developed in 7 very long days for the Epic MegaJam 2020 by Five Fancy Mustachios. They are: Ambershee, Kashaar, Uncleboof, Klaris, and Prattatatat

It's been a long time - but we're not done yet.

The Player has returned to Stifflimp, a small town in the old West, and they have scores to settle - in a pistol duel to the death!

The Player's memory isn't what it used to be though; so they must refer to their notes to pick out their enemies' weaknesses and choose appropriate witty retorts to bring with them. The correct comeback delivered at the right time will catch their opponent off guard, allowing a potentially fatal shot to be delivered!

Be warned though; picking the wrong retort, or simply not being quick enough will result in a retort being wasted!
